version_description: Improved classic electrical experiment details based on first-line teacher feedback, more accurate electrical simulation, and sensitive galvanometer and student power (AC) support! Now we also have multi-language support.

Improved classic electrical experiment details based on first-line teacher feedback, more accurate electrical simulation, and sensitive galvanometer and student power (AC) support! Now we also have multi-language support.

Improved classic electrical experiment details based on first-line teacher feedback, more accurate electrical simulation, and sensitive galvanometer and student power (AC) support! Now we also have multi-language support.

Automatic circuit diagram generation from experiment! AR experiments on latest iOS 11 devices!

# Features
Initial support for automatic conversion between circuit diagram and experiment.
AR experiment support on latest iOS devices with iOS 11.
Enhanced 3D appearance for all electric meters.

# Minor Changes
Batteries can now be the ideal power source.
All meters now switch between ideal / real mode.
